A '''potato fence gate''' is a potato variant of a [[fence gate]], crafted from the respective [[potato planks]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Potato fence gate can be broken with anything, but axes are faster.
{{Breaking row|horizontal=1|Potato Fence Gate|axe|hidecopper=1}}

=== Natural generation ===
Potato fence gates generate naturally as part of [[potato village]]s.

=== Crafting ===
{{Crafting
|head=1
|A3=Stick
|B3=Potato Planks
|C3=Stick
|A2=Stick
|B2=Potato Planks
|C2=Stick
|Output=Potato Fence Gate
|ignoreusage=1
|foot=1}}

== Usage ==
{{for|information about the mechanics of all fence gates|Fence Gate#Usage}}

=== Note blocks ===
Potato fence gates can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass" sounds.

=== Block states ===
{{See also|Block states}}

{{bst|facing|north|east,north,south,west|For an open gate, the direction the gates swing open.<br>For a closed gate, the direction the player was facing when the gate was placed, or the last direction the gates have swung.}}
{{bst|in_wall|false|false,true|If true, the gate is lowered by three pixels, to accommodate attaching more cleanly with [[wall]]s.}}
{{bst|open|false|false,true|If true, the gate is opened.}}
{{bst|powered|false|false,true|If true, the gate is receiving redstone power.|foot=1}}
